value.stringValue: {"mentions":[],"message":"Bonjour @[{![Case].OwnerId}],\n\nUne dérogation pour la date de démarrage Saas du client {![Case].AccountName__c} est soumise à votre validation."}

Bonjour @[{!myVariable_current.OwnerId}],

rules.name: myRule_13
rules.conditionLogic: 1 AND 2 AND (3 OR 4 OR 5 OR 6 OR 7 OR 8 OR 9 OR 10 OR 11)
rules.label: Particular Conditions Validated with Particular Conditions

rules.name: myRule_16
rules.label: Particular Conditions Validated with Increase Type to be created

value.stringValue: AND( NOT(ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE([Case].Status), 'In progress')), NOT(ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE([Case].Status), 'Closed')), ISCHANGED([Case].Assignedto__c), NOT(ISNULL([Case].Assignedto__c)) )
